entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
